articles.content: The "Saturday Night Live" episode seems to fully understand Elordi's main appeal at the moment. His most recent movie, "Saltburn," is filled with lustful montages of him. The dude spent seemingly hal… [+1262 chars]

articles.title: Love Lies Bleeding Review - Kristen Stewart's Gonzo Thriller - Bloody Disgusting
articles.description: Filmmaker Rose Glass has an audacious way of exploring obsession, pushing it to extremes in beguiling, genre-defying ways. Her feature debut, Saint Maud, centered on a nurse who took her religious fanaticism to extremes, compounded by an obsession with her la…
